Q: How often has user been experiencing fatigue recently, and has it become more or less severe over time?
What patterns have emerged regarding user's weight fluctuations, and could these be linked to any recent changes in medication or diet?
Has user's energy level varied at different times of the day, and what might this indicate about the effectiveness of the current treatment?
How frequently has user reported feeling colder than usual, and what possible underlying causes could explain this symptom?
To what extent has user followed the recommendations on physical activity, and has there been any noticeable improvement in mood or energy as a result?
How often has user monitored their cholesterol and blood pressure, and have any recent changes raised concerns?
What adjustments to user's diet were recommended by the AI assistant, and has user found these changes manageable and effective?
How has user's mood been over the past few weeks, and could any observed changes be tied to thyroid function or other health factors?
How consistently has user been taking their medication, and has there been any confusion or issues with adhering to the prescribed routine?
What recent health discussions have focused on medication or dosage, and what was the outcome of those conversations?
What proactive measures has user taken to address any recurring symptoms, and have these strategies been effective?
